title: The Umbrellas, Joint Project for Japan and U.S.A.
medium: pastel, enamel paint, graphite, colored pencil, wax crayon, aerial photograph with topographic contour map, technical data, and fabric sample, on two sheets of paperboard in two parts
dimensions:
sheet (left panel): 77.5 x 30.5 cm (30 1/2 x 12 in.)
framed (left panel): 78.2 x 31.3 x 4.3 cm (30 13/16 x 12 5/16 x 1 11/16 in.)
sheet (right panel): 77.5 x 66.7 cm (30 1/2 x 26 1/4 in.)
framed (right panel): 78.2 x 67.4 x 4.3 cm (30 13/16 x 26 9/16 x 1 11/16 in.)
overall size (for both panels): 77.5 x 99.7 cm (30 1/2 x 39 1/4 in.)
